body:
Ok, finally I figure it out what's going wrong with the bindings: 
- **context.go** contains a _struct_ with no acceptable type (ref. https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/mobile/cmd/gomobile)
- **dbmanager.go** contains slices and a struct that returns a value that are not allowed (struct) (ref. https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/mobile/cmd/gomobile), replaced with string
